thread.title: BRIEF-International Flavors & Fragrances Reports Q1 EPS Of $1.63

title: BRIEF-International Flavors & Fragrances Reports Q1 EPS Of $1.63
text:
May 7 (Reuters) - International Flavors & Fragrances Inc :
* REPORTED EARNINGS PER SHARE (EPS) FOR Q1 WAS $1.63 PER DILUTED SHARE
* REPORTED NET SALES FOR Q1 TOTALED $931 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 12% FROM $828 MILLION IN 2017
* TARGETING UPPER END OF 2018 SALES AND OPERATING PROFIT GUIDANCE RANGE
* SEES 2018 CURRENCY NEUTRAL EPS GROWTH OF 4.0% - 6.0%
* SEES 2018 CURRENCY NEUTRAL SALES GROWTH OF 3.0% - 5.0%
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.59, REVENUE VIEW $911.3 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
